translations: [林]红树林（mangrove 的复数）；红树属植物

sentences.sentence: According to Davis' scheme, the shoreline is being extended in a seaward direction because of the "land-building" role of mangroves, which, by trapping sediments over time, extend the shore.
sentences.translation: 根据戴维斯的计划，由于红树林的“陆地建设”作用，随着时间的推移，通过捕获沉积物，海岸线向海的方向延伸。

sentences.sentence: Oil Spill Would Threaten Mangroves, Spawning Fish
sentences.translation: 石油泄漏会威胁到红树林和产卵的鱼类

sentences.sentence: Their equipment had been jettisoned at sea; most of their weapons had been lost among the mangroves.
sentences.translation: 他们迫不得已把装备扔进了大海中，而绝大部分的武器早已遗落在红林之中。
